name: Oathbreaker
description: An Oathbreaker has forsaken their sacred vows to pursue a darker path.

3.name: Control Undead
3.description: As an action, target an undead within 30 feet; on a failed Wisdom save it must obey your commands for 24 hours, unless its challenge rating is equal to or greater than your level.

3.name: Dreadful Aspect
3.description: As an action, creatures of your choice within 30 feet that can see you must make a Wisdom save or become frightened of you for 1 minute.

7.name: Aura of Hate
7.description: You and any fiends and undead within 10 feet gain a bonus to melee weapon damage rolls equal to your Charisma modifier.

15.name: Supernatural Resistance
15.description: You gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons.

20.name: Dread Lord
20.description: As an action, for 1 minute an aura of gloom surrounds you. Frightened enemies in the aura take 4d10 psychic damage at the start of their turns, and you and chosen creatures are shrouded in darkness. You can use a bonus action to make a melee spell attack dealing 3d10 + your Charisma modifier necrotic damage. Once per long rest.

choices.name: Oathbreaker Feature
choices.description: Choose an option for the Oathbreaker subclass
